headline: Is the Recent Glass Innovation Surge Justifying Corning’s 87% Share Price Gain in 2025?
summary: If you are holding Corning stock or considering jumping in, you are not alone in asking, “Is now the right time?” The share price has been on a strong upward climb this year, closing at $87.41 most recently and showing an eye-catching 87.1% gain year-to-date. Even more, Corning boasts a remarkable 93.1% return over the past year and an impressive 214.6% return over five years. Investors have clearly taken notice. Much of the optimism can be traced back to a recent wave of positive headlines...
